attributes.action: Give police powers to penalise inconsiderate motorway drivers. (Middle lane hogs)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too often do I see inconsiderate drivers not adhering to the rules of the road to keep left! They are called middle lane hoggers that increase the level of congestion on Britain's motorways. I petition the government to use overhead matrix signs as a reminder to people to keep left and to give police measures to fine/warn/issue points to these drivers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
